Posts.Content: frenchielover wrote: I am in a situation where I really like my oncologist, but not sure if my mix of chemo drugs produces the best results.  I am an advanced stage IIIB with 19 positive lymph nodes and a 4.3 cm tumor.  I had a bilateral mastectomy and am currently getting Taxotere and Cytoxan chemotherapy.  For some reason, my oncologist did not give me Adriamycin.  I "heard" that Taxotere and Cytoxan are used to treat less aggressive cancers which is not mine.  And Ariamycin, Taxotere and Cytoxan is used to treat more aggressive cancers.  I am worried that I am being short changed.  I am in the middle of my treatments and not sure what I should do at this point.  Any suggestions? Unfortunately, my insurance only covers seeing this doctor..... Dx 7/22/2011, IDC, 4cm, Stage IIIB, Grade 3, 19/27 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Chemo - which mix of drugs are the best? frenchielover frenchielover
